George Floyd 
Breonna Taylor
Michael Brown 
Tamir Rice 
Atatiana Jefferson 
And countless others. 

How many more times must our communities be put through the trauma of another Black man or woman killed at the hands of police? Passing our Justice in Policing Act can’t wait.

What we saw in Georgia was the latest Republican attempt to suppress the vote—and another wake-up call heading into November. 

We need every level of government to secure protections now so that everyone can vote safely and easily. Sadly, she is not alone. Voters all over Georgia are experiencing long lines & broken voting machines.

This is voter suppression in action.

The bureaucratic National Environmental Policy Act has hindered key infrastructure projects and in many cases held back job creation. That’s why I introduced 2 bills to reform NEPA and get the boot of the government off the backs of our businesses.

We know that @USArmy, @USNavy & @USMC confinement & corrections facilities rely on @ACAinfo’s toothless accreditations, but ACA hasn't provided us complete info. @RepRubenGallego & I asked the @DeptofDefense for performance reviews & accreditation reports for every facility.

The American Correctional Association accredits military corrections facilities so they meet basic standards. But @ACAinfo also takes millions in funding from private prisons, so it's impossible to fail an audit. This conflict has been a disaster for @ICEgov detention facilities.

The health & safety of the @DeptofDefense’s military prisons are critical to the rights & well-being of detainees & personnel, & our national security. But @RepRubenGallego & I have serious concerns about the accreditation process of these facilities. https://www.motherjones.com/crime-justice/2020/06/elizabeth-Warren-grills-pentagon-about-toothless-oversight-of-military-prisons/

RT @SenatorTimScott And don’t throw “you’re the only black guy they know” at me either. There are only two black Democratic Senators, stop pretending there’s some huge racial diversity gap in the Senate. Ask my Dem colleagues what their staffs look like...I guarantee you won’t like the answer.

RT @SenatorTimScott Not surprising the last 24 hours have seen a lot of “token” “boy” or “you’re being used” in my mentions. Let me get this straight...you DON’T want the person who has faced racial profiling by police, been pulled over dozens of times, or been speaking out for YEARS drafting this?

Here’s a radical idea:

Don’t censor Gone With The Wind. 

Don’t censor Blazing Saddles. 

Don’t censor Quentin Tarantino. 

Don’t censor ANYTHING. 

#FreeSpeech #ArtisticFreedom https://twitter.com/rollingstone/status/1270761073923235840 QT @RollingStone 'Blazing Saddles' is no 'Gone With the Wind' — it's always been an anti-racism, anti-white-paranoia film, as Mel Brooks explained https://trib.al/gNCC9tf http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EaKmdnNWAAk0ocP.jpg

RT @NydiaVelazquez Today's police forces look more like armies equipped with weapons of war. A fed'l program from the 1990s sends surplus military equipment to NYPD & other police. Today, I've introduced legislation to end this initiative once and for all.  #BlackLivesMatter #EndPoliceViolence 1/3 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EaKP20iWoAguAGa.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EaKP4KMWAAQIYFG.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EaKP5sIXsAUsUL6.png
